translations: n.[光] 标线；[光] 分划板；[光] 十字线

sentences.sentence: This article presents a discourse upon how to construct a pint-sized campus network, involving the choice of network structure, the center commutator and layout of reticles.
sentences.translation: 本文就如何搭建一个小型的校园网络进行了探讨，谈到了网络结构的选择、中心交换机的选择、布放网线等方面的问题。
